title: Jenkins is down!
description: Jenkins is down for no apparent reason, delaying all your projects. Only David knows how to fix it.
effect: Move back 1 square every turn. Discard David to remove this effect.

title: Meeting with ITCPD
description: You have to go to another frustrating project meeting.
effect: Throw 2 dice and move back those many squares.

title: Time for marking
description: Your whole team needs to do some urgent marking. Everything else gets delayed.
effect: Move back as many squares as project cards you have.

title: The Architects get involved
description: Brace! Your projects can go very well or very badly.
effect: Discard all your cards and draw 3 new cards. Good luck!

title: It's Agile time!
description: Yeah. Not that kind of Agile. Sorry.
effect: Discard RCI, RC, RDS, RITA, Eva and Clare, if you have them.

title: Raquel
description: Raquel's too busy and can't take any more projects.
effect: Keep this card. Discard all project cards you draw in the future.

title: Roma
description: Roma knows a lot about a lot, and isn't afraid to explain it. Are you sure you've thought that through?
effect: Keep this card. If you would draw a card, roll a die and only draw if you roll 3 or more.

title: Estates
description: Estates have completed a building refit.
effect: Every player randomly swaps places then moves back one space.

title: HR
description: HR get the job description wrong again.
effect: Lose one randomly selected team member.

title: Grace's network glitches
description: There's a sporadic error in Grace's networking infrastructure.
effect: Your jobs fail, go back 3 squares. (Unless you have Research Computing Infrastructure, who save the day.)

title: Corrupt backups
description: Your system backups are corrupted!
effect: Lose a turn sorting out the mess, unless you have Research Computing Infrastructure.

title: Funding confirmed!
description: A grant proposal was successful.
effect: Miss a turn if you have more projects than team members, while you recruit. Otherwise, move +1 per team member card you have.

title: The Fortran Curse
description: You left the cursed Fortran book out of its magic chest overnight, and now the office is flooded.
effect: Lose a turn while you clean up and order new laptops, and lose Jens if you have him.

title: Cold War with Computer Science
description: Projects got allocated to CS guys instead.
effect: Lose half your projects and the team members on CS projects (Asif, Roland and Jonathan if in hand).

title: Loss of crates
description: Some crates mysteriously disappear while moving offices.
effect: Your fancy screens are gone! Productivity is reduced. Move back 2 squares per project in hand.

title: Professor Keeter Bloveney
description: One of your old collaborators demands you go back and fix his code.
effect: Go back 8 squares or lose a team member.

title: The Provost
description: The provost cuts jobs across professional services to pay for his latest vanity project. RITS staff strike in solidarity.
effect: Roll a die and lose that many team members.

title: Strike !
description: UCU calls for pension strike.
effect: Your team members are striking. Projects are delayed. Roll a dice per team member and move back that many squares.

title: Metadata loss
description: Research Data's object store has lost the metadata.
effect: Swap all project cards with a player of your choice.

title: Roland
description: Roland takes a loooooooooooong time to understand the subtleties of perfect software crafting.
effect: He will eventually get there. Reduce your forward moves by 1 for the time spent in explanations.

title: DDoS attack
description: UCLU have cancelled a speaker and as a result UCL are under attack from a botnet.
effect: Miss a turn

title: GDPR
description: You spend too much time sorting out all GPDR emails.

title: Geekbot is going crazy!
description: You receive random Geekbot notifications.
effect: Have you chosen who will you pair with ? If not, by the end of reading, move to the last player position.

title: Security hole
description: A PI has demanded you implement something in an insecure way as their project is not a target for hackers.
effect: Hold your cards face down in front of the other players, and allow them each to steal one at random.

title: Bad research
description: Someone is running simulations on the cluster, looking for a positive result they can publish.
effect: Roll the dice as many times as it takes to get the number of moves you want, then discard this card.

title: Asif
description: Asif has decided to spend the afternoon hacking his dotfiles.
effect: Lose a turn until he comes to his senses. Discard this card.

title: Anastasis
description: Anastasis is working on projects he knows nothing about, and is distracted with background reading.
effect: Roll a die and move back that many squares. Discard this card.

title: GitHub is being acquired by $ome software company.
description: You are worried about your opensource projects
effect: This event affects everyone! Every player loses two project cards to the player on their right (choose randomly).

title: Evil Corp. summoned Mecha-Bentham to subjugate UCL.
description: ROOOOOAAAARRR!!!!!
effect: Everything is lost ! All players go back to the beginning.
